previewArticle.title: Greece vs. Ivory Coast: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Greece 2, Ivory Coast 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Match Recap

timelineItems.name: Mandey Marshall
timelineItems.text: Would love to see a #CIV win. It would mean so much to the #Toure family. And the Drog. #worldcup2014 #GREvCIV

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Hugo Sanchez
timelineItems.text: C'mon Côte d'Ivoire! Let's get out of this group!! #LesElephants #GREvCIV #stupidGreekJerseys

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: Both matches have started. Could be a crazy finish to #GroupC. #GREvCIV #JPNvCOL #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Didier Drogba (Côte d'Ivoire).
Kostas Manolas (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Panagiotis Kone (Greece) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Bryan Zarpentine
timelineItems.text: Of course, #CIV ignores my advise on wearing Orange; don't blame me if you lose.

timelineItems.name: stepupsockgame
timelineItems.text: Cheering along the boys from the Ivory Coast! #sockgame @ralphlauren #CIV #sockswag #sockgents #socksnobs #sockstagram #instasock #worldcup #motherland #LesElephants

timelineItems.name: Fani Valkanas
timelineItems.text: So my dad thinks that #Greece is going to win by 3 goals against #IvoryCoast but I think it will be 2 goals. #GreeceVsIvoryCoast #GRE

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Hague
timelineItems.text: At least #CIV are trying to win. Not sure how #GRE ecpect to do so the way that they are set up.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dimitrios Salpingidis (Greece) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Vasilis Torosidis with a cross.

timelineItems.name: FofTheDreamer_highlivin
timelineItems.text:
Allez les éléphants ! Go CIV ! #gametime #CIV 
#CIV

timelineItems.name: The Full Pitch Press
timelineItems.text: Drogba's selection back into the #CIV XI has been a great decision. Dropping deep and bringing others into play, something Bony didn't do.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Didier Drogba with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: #FRA #POR
timelineItems.text: Il ont une bonne équipe sur le papier la #CIV, mais un peu vielle quand même. #GRECIV

timelineItems.comment: Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Dimitrios Salpingidis (Greece).

timelineItems.name: Abeeku Francis
timelineItems.text: This #CIV and #GRE game is mbooooooooriiiiiing

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Orestis Karnezis (Greece) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Xolani Mcono
timelineItems.text: What is going on with Greece #GRE players?! 2nd Player to come out! #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Soccer4Peace
timelineItems.text: And we're stopped again. Did Greece stretch before the game? #CIV v. #GRE #WorldCup2014 http://t.co/RDDHavmAAk

timelineItems.name: Soccer4Peace
timelineItems.text: And we're stopped again. Did Greece stretch before the game? #CIV v. #GRE #WorldCup2014 http://t.co/RDDHavmAAk

timelineItems.name: Treble Nikki
timelineItems.text: Oh man, how am I supposed to enjoy #GREvCIV when I'm still enjoying the Suarez reaction?!??

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Ray Curren
timelineItems.text: Field in Fortaleza looks like one of those grass ones they lay over turf for international friendlies here. #GREvCIV

timelineItems.name: Edward Baptist
timelineItems.text: #GREvCIV Greece actually trying to score this time, but still time-wasting.

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Greece 2, Côte d'Ivoire 1.

timelineItems.name: Gabriel Tate
timelineItems.text: Even Greece can't avoid being involved in a dramatic match in this World Cup. Still wish Ivory Coast had won though #grevciv

timelineItems.name: thereddestbull
timelineItems.text: Neither team deserves to advance. #GREvCIV

timelineItems.name: Dominic Monaghan
timelineItems.text: Incredible drama in the #GREvCIV game. Wow. Just. Wow. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Richard B
timelineItems.text: HOPA!!! #GREvCIV

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece advances to its first #WorldCup knockout round on a stoppage-time penalty. Opa.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 270 - Georgios Samaras scored with his first shot on target of the tournament (after playing for 270 minutes + injury time). Gift. #GRE

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece scores its 3rd-ever #WorldCup goal in 9 games. 1st time Greece has scored first in a WC game.

timelineItems.name: Nath St Paul
timelineItems.text: You can knock the Greek style of play all you want but it gets the job done. I wish England played a bit more like this. #GREvCIV

timelineItems.text: oh dear. greece through to a terrible refereeing decision. #grevciv #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kolo Touré (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Yaya Touré.
Second Half ends, Greece 2, Côte d'Ivoire 1.

timelineItems.name: Joe Crann
timelineItems.text: #Brazil2014 is the first World Cup in which #COL have won more than once... #SLWC

timelineItems.name: Valta
timelineItems.text: Should I watch #GREvCIV or #JPNvCOL? Hmm... Definitely Colombia I think. #TrickyDecisions

timelineItems.name: Jules
timelineItems.text: So much respect for the Toure brothers, really hope Ivory Coast win tonight. #GREvCIV

timelineItems.name: Paula Chapman
timelineItems.text: Heart goes out to Kolo and Yaya Toure tonight, playing for their country after death of their younger brother #bravery #GREvCIV #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Kaiser Söze
timelineItems.text: Good to see The Drog starting today! Come on Côte D'Ivoire #GREvCIV #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Rev. Ray
timelineItems.text: One of my favorite parts of the World Cup is the national anthems before every match #forclubandcountry

timelineItems.text: Guess the metal detectors aren’t working… #GREvCIV http://t.co/gO6JkjOXH3
